title: Understanding Formula Copying
text: When you want to copy a formula to a data table, think about how you can replicate the formula without manually rewriting it.

title: Using Cell References
text: Consider using cell references to make the process of copying formulas easier and more efficient.

hintAnswer: write out $$=(cell$$ where the original formula is)
title: Using the Fill Handle
text: One of the simplest ways to copy a formula in a spreadsheet is by using the fill handle. This allows you to drag the formula across cells.
choices: write out $$=(cell$$ where the original formula is)
